info.title: OMA LwM2M Multiple Axis Joystick (Object ID 3345)

Multiple_Axis_Joystick.label: Multiple Axis Joystick
Multiple_Axis_Joystick.description: This IPSO object can be used to report the position of a shuttle or joystick control. A digital input is provided to report the state of an associated push button.

Digital_Input_State.label: Digital Input State
Digital_Input_State.description: The current state of a digital input.

Digital_Input_Counter.label: Digital Input Counter
Digital_Input_Counter.description: The cumulative value of active state detected.

X_Value.label: X Value
X_Value.description: The measured value along the X axis.

Y_Value.label: Y Value
Y_Value.description: The measured value along the Y axis.

Z_Value.label: Z Value
Z_Value.description: The measured value along the Z axis.

Application_Type.label: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
